content:
Hey {me}, did you hear? We have a new friend!
Your new creature friend really likes Mobai.
Why don't you drop by and meet them when you have time~

{me}, have you met our new friend yet?
He seems very knowledgeable and quite witty~

Why don't you go say hi to him?
I think you'll like him.

Oh, did our world bubble get a new friend?
I heard they're quite the accomplished scholar!
Let's go say hi when we get the chance~
